settings.ekit_heading_title: THE WHY:  Your Shopping, Your Way:
settings.ekit_heading_extra_title:
Why we decided to offer 4 different way of shopping:

....  are you someone who enjoys the thrill of winning, like me !!! or are you someone who needs items now at a deal price, like me!!! or are you someone who is trying to get daily essentials but not compromise on quality but you only wish they're more affordable, like me !!! or are you someone who enjoys fixing broken items and it hurts you to see them thrown away when a new life can be given to them, LIKE MEE !!!!

Are'nt we all are like ME!!!

settings.ekit_heading_title: Discover Our Four Unique ways of {{buying}} you favorite brands for an incredible pricing
settings.ekit_heading_sub_title: What we are trying to acheive...
settings.ekit_heading_extra_title: At 4more, we're all about making shopping fun, rewarding, and accessible for everyone. Explore our channels today and experience the future of shopping!

settings.ekit_icon_box_description_text: Ready to win big? Feel the thrill of the chase! Win big with up to 90% off retail prices. Ready, set, bid!
Instant gratification at unbeatable prices! Get what you want, when you want, with discounts of 50% or more.
Every day is a deal day! Grab your essentials starting, our prices drops daily to $0.5. Dive into savings every week!
Revive and thrive! Buy items with minor defects, repair them, and profit. Give them a second chance!

settings.ekit_heading_sub_title: Sneak peak at what's cooking inside !!...
settings.ekit_heading_extra_title: At 4more, we believe in turning shopping into an adventure, and our upcoming events are designed to do just that!

settings.testimonial_content: "I recently discovered 4more's Bin4more channel, and I am absolutely thrilled with the deals I found! The weekly cycle of discounts is perfect for stocking up on essentials without breaking the bank. The platform is easy to navigate, and the checkout process was a breeze. I can't wait to explore more of their channels like Bid4more and Fix4more. Highly recommend to anyone looking for great deals and a unique shopping experience!"

"As a college student, budgeting is super important, and 4more's Pay4more channel has been a lifesaver! I can snag amazing deals at 50% off or more, which means I can stretch my dollars further on the things I need. The platform is straightforward, and I love the variety of products available. It's like having a sale every day! Thanks, 4more Group, for making shopping affordable and fun!"
